modelIdentification.name: NETN-ORG
modelIdentification.purpose: Produce a Organisation definition (MSDL style) in a HLA Federation Execution
modelIdentification.useHistory: v1.0.0 - the first release of the FOM module.

poc.pocName: MSG-163 Evolution of NATO Standards for Federated Simulation

modelIdentification.other:

You are also allowed to develop your own new FOM Modules (in separate XML files and separate documentation) that build-on/extends the NETN module by reference. You are NOT allowed to modify the NETN FOM Module or its documentation without prior permission by the NATO Modelling and Simulation Group.

objectClass.name: ORG_Root
objectClass.semantics: Root object class for the NETN-ORG object classes.

attribute.name: Name
attribute.semantics: Name, shall be unique. For units, e.g. use the value from the NETN Callsign attribute. For federates, use the Federate Name used in the HLA join command.

attribute.name: UniqueId
attribute.semantics: Unique Identifier, msdl:UnitType/ObjectHandle.

objectClass.name: FederateApplication
objectClass.semantics: Defines deployment of units for a federate application. The Units attribute defines the units that the federate has modelling responsibility for. This is an extension to the MSDL standard defined bij MSG-106.

attribute.name: Units
attribute.semantics: The units that the federate has responsibility for.

objectClass.name: Unit
objectClass.semantics:
Specifies a Unit attributes. Attributes are derivied from the MSDL standard and extensions defined in MSG-106.
Following attributes are defined in MSG-106: EntityType Holdings EmbarkedIn IsSimulationEntity

attribute.name: SuperiorUnit
attribute.semantics: Required: Reference to the superior unit of this unit. If this unit has no superior unit (i.e. is the top-unit) then the value of this attribute shall be "000000000000000".

attribute.name: EntityType
attribute.semantics: DIS Enumeration, defining the type of the entity, e.g. for the Main Battle Tank type Leopard 2 A5, the value shall be: 1.1.78.1.2.5.0.

attribute.name: SymbolId2525C
attribute.semantics: msdl:UnitType/SymbolIdentifier, MIL 2525 C symbol code. Required. The symbol code describes the class, e.g. for ARMOR TRACK, HEAVY as a Leopard 2 shall the symbol code be: S*GPUCATH-*****, the * in second (2:nd) position is to be replaced to specify the affiliation. The affiliation on a unit may change during an federation execution which imply that the 2:nd character will change. Other characters specifies functionallity, e.g. if a submarine is surfaced or bottomed which can be the case during a federation execution.

attribute.name: SymbolId2525D
attribute.semantics: msdl:UnitType/SymbolIdentifier-2525D, MIL-STD-2525D symbol code.

attribute.name: Force
attribute.semantics: The value is the UUID value of the Force that the unit belongs to.

attribute.name: Holdings
attribute.semantics: A sequence of holdings at the unit.

attribute.name: IsSimulationEntity
attribute.semantics: Indicates if the ORBAT Unit is created during the federation execution and its existence is to manage simulation activites. For normal ORBAT Units is this False. Simulation Units will not be saved when a MSDL ORBAT is saved to file. No corresponding tag in the MSDL schema.

attribute.name: EmbarkedIn
attribute.semantics: The host unit that the unit is a part of at scenarion initialisation.

attribute.name: UniqueDesignation
attribute.semantics: UnitSymbolModifiers: Symbol’s unique designation. Text for the symbols unique designation, e.g. the value at the RPR Marking attribute.

attribute.name: Echelon
attribute.semantics: UnitSymbolModifiers: Graphic modifier that identifies the command level.

attribute.name: CombatEffectiveness
attribute.semantics: UnitSymbolModifiers: Specifies the modifier that indicates the ability of a unit to perform its mission.

attribute.name: HigherFormation
attribute.semantics: UnitSymbolModifiers: When the designation is different that the one specified by the Relations element.

attribute.name: IFF
attribute.semantics: UnitSymbolModifiers: Displays IFF/SIF identification modes and codes.

attribute.name: Location
attribute.semantics: Disposition: If altitude is negative, then below sea level (e.g subs).

attribute.name: Direction
attribute.semantics:
Disposition: The Direction of Movement, in compass degrees, of a scenario element.
Optional.

attribute.name: Speed
attribute.semantics:
Disposition: Unit speed (for display only).
Optional.

attribute.name: FormationPosition
attribute.semantics:
Disposition: The position of this unit/eqiupment in the higher unit formation.
Optional.

attribute.name: OwnFormation
attribute.semantics:
Disposition: The formation of this unit.
Optional.

attribute.name: CategoryCode
attribute.semantics: JC3IEDM-3.1: The specific value that represents the class of UNIT-TYPE.

attribute.name: CommandFunctionIndicatorCode
attribute.semantics: JC3IEDM-3.1: The specific value that denotes whether an ORGANISATION-TYPE has a command function.

attribute.name: SizeCode
attribute.semantics:
JC3IEDM-3.1: The specific value that represents the relative size of the commonly accepted configuration of military formations.
Specifies the Ground Thruth size.

attribute.name: ArmCategoryCode
attribute.semantics: JC3IEDM-3.1: The specific value that represents the designation of a military branch for a particular UNIT-TYPE.

attribute.name: TypeServiceCode
attribute.semantics: JC3IEDM-3.1: The specific value that represents a military, paramilitary, irregular force, force or group, capable of functioning as an offensive or defensive combat or support organisation.

objectClass.name: VesselUnit
objectClass.semantics: This class defines additional attributes for a Vessel Unit in order to instantiate a vessel in a simulation.

attribute.name: MID
attribute.semantics: The Maritime Identification Digits (MID) for the vessel. If the value is zero or not provided then the subscribing federate that is responsible for the modelling of the vessel shall generate a value.

attribute.name: IMO
attribute.semantics: The International Maritime Organization (IMO) number to identify the vessel. If the value is zero or not provided then the subscribing federate that is responsible for the modelling of the vessel shall generate a value.

attribute.name: ShipType
attribute.semantics: Type of ship. If the value is zero or not provided then the subscribing federate that is responsible for the modelling of the vessel shall generate a value.

attribute.name: DimensionBow
attribute.semantics: Distance from bow. Reference point for the reported position. If the value is zero or not provided then the subscribing federate that is responsible for the modelling of the vessel shall generate a value.

attribute.name: DimensionStern
attribute.semantics: Distance from stern. Reference point for the reported position. If the value is zero or not provided then the subscribing federate that is responsible for the modelling of the vessel shall generate a value.

attribute.name: DimensionPort
attribute.semantics: Distance from port. Reference point for the reported position. If the value is zero or not provided then the subscribing federate that is responsible for the modelling of the vessel shall generate a value.

attribute.name: DimensionStarboard
attribute.semantics: Distance from straboard. Reference point for the reported position. If the value is zero or not provided then the subscribing federate that is responsible for the modelling of the vessel shall generate a value.

attribute.name: TransmitterStatus
attribute.updateCondition: When the tansmitter status updated by the vessel
attribute.semantics: The initial status of the AIS Transmitter(s) on board of the vessel. If the value is not provided then the value shall assumed to be ON.

objectClass.name: SARAircraftUnit
objectClass.semantics: This class defines additional attributes for a SAR Aircraft Unit in order to instantiate a SAR aircraft in a simulation.

attribute.name: MID
attribute.semantics: The Maritime Identification Digits (MID) for the SAR aircraft. If the value is zero or not provided then the subscribing federate that is responsible for the modelling of the SAR aircraft shall generate a value.

objectClass.name: Force
objectClass.semantics:
Units in an ORBAT belongs to a Force.
Forces have relations to each other which is specified in the attribute Relations. The relation between forces is defined by HostilityStatusCodeEnum32, e.g. FR (Friendly), HO (Hostile). The relation between Force A and Force B does not have to be the same as the relation between B and A. The relation may change during a federation execution.

attribute.name: Relations
attribute.semantics: Sequence of relations, force-relation.

enumeratedData.name: UnitTypeCategoryCodeEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: The specific value that represents the class of UNIT-TYPE.

enumeratedData.name: UnitTypeArmCategoryCodeEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: The specific value that represents the designation of a military branch for a particular UNIT-TYPE.

enumeratedData.name: UnitTypeSizeCodeEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: The specific value that represents the relative size of the commonly accepted configuration of military formations.

enumeratedData.name: MilitaryOrganisationTypeServiceCodeEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: The specific value that represents a military, paramilitary, irregular force, force or group, capable of functioning as an offensive or defensive combat or support organisation.

enumeratedData.name: HostilityStatusCodeEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: The specific value that represents the perceived hostility status.

enumeratedData.name: FormationLocationTypeEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: Enumerated choice for the method used to correlate formation to location as center of mass or lead element.

enumeratedData.name: FormationTypeEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: Enumerated choice for the type of formation being Ground, Air, Surface or Subsurface.

enumeratedData.name: CoordinateSystemEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: MSDL supports coordinate systems of MGRS, UTM, GDC, and GCC. Each coordinate element provides a choice of the coordinate system to be used.

arrayData.name: IFF5
arrayData.semantics: Text modifier for identification friend or foe (IFF).

arrayData.name: Text21
arrayData.semantics: General text of max length 21 characters.

fixedRecordData.name: Relation
fixedRecordData.semantics: The specific value that represents the perceived hostility status of a specific OBJECT-ITEM. Description of enumerations can be found in Domain List of JC3IEDM under object-item-hostility-status-code.

field.name: Affiliate
field.semantics: The force that the current force has a relation to

field.name: RelationShip
field.semantics: The level of the relation

fixedRecordData.name: Holding
fixedRecordData.semantics: Static and dynamic data about the holding.

field.name: OperationalCount
field.semantics: The number of specific OBJECT-TYPEs a specific OBJECT-ITEM has available for operations

field.name: OnHandQuantity
field.semantics: Current number of the holding.

field.name: RequiredOnHandQuantity
field.semantics: The required number of the holding.

field.name: IsEquipment
field.semantics: True if is equipment, false for expendables.

field.name: EntityType
field.semantics: DIS enumeration. Use 0.0.0.0.0.0.0 when not defined.

field.name: NSNcode
field.semantics: 13 digits (0-9)

field.name: NSNname
field.semantics: Nato Stock Number

fixedRecordData.name: FormationPositionStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: The position of this unit/eqiupment in the higher unit formation.

field.name: OutOfFormation
field.semantics: Identifies if the element is maneuvering independent from the higher unit's formation.

field.name: FormationOrder
field.semantics: The placement, 1 to N, of a subordinate in the superior unit formation.

field.name: SensorOrientation
field.semantics: Orientation of the main sensor, sights, and weapon in compass degrees relative to orientation of the platform (equipment).

field.name: FormationLocationType
field.semantics: The method used to correlate formation to location as center of mass or lead element. LEAD_ELEMENT or CENTER_OF_MASS

field.name: FormationSpacing
field.semantics: The default spacing in metres between subordinate elements one echelon below.

field.name: FormationOrientation
field.semantics: Orientation in compass degrees for unit formations and equipment.

field.name: FormationChoice
field.semantics: The type of formation (Ground, Air, Surface or Subsurface). GROUND, AIR, SURFACE or SUBSURFACE

field.name: FormationData
field.semantics: The formation data specific to the specified formation type. GroundFormationType: COLUMN, STAGGERED_COLUMN, ECHELON_LEFT, ECHELON_RIGHT, LINE, WEDGE, VEE, ASSAULT_VEE, STACK or NONE AirFormationType: NOT_SPECIFIED SurfaceFomationType: NOT_SPECIFIED SubsurfaceFormationType: NOT_SPECIFIED

fixedRecordData.name: MGRSStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: The MGRS element, specifies the Military Grid Reference System (MGRS) coordinate and is made up of the child elements.

field.name: GridZone
field.semantics: The MGRSGridZone element specifies the MGRS Grid Zone designator to include the number and letter as defined by NIMA TM 8358.1.

field.name: GridSquare
field.semantics: The MGRSGridSquare element specifies the one hundred thousand meter grid square designator as defined by NIMA TM 8358.1.

field.name: Precision
field.semantics: The MGRSPrecision element specifies the precision or scale of easting and northing values. MGRSPrecision can be assigned a value of 2 to define a number using kilometers as its units of measure; a value of 3 to define a number using 100 meters as its units of measure, a value of 4 to define a number using 10 meters as its units of measure, or a value of 5 to define a number using meters as its units of measure.

field.name: Easting
field.semantics: The MGRSEasting element specifies the easting component of the MGRS coordinates to the precision value of the MGRS precision element.

field.name: Northing
field.semantics: The MGRSNorthing element specifies the northing component of the MGRS coordinates to the precision value of the MGRS precision element.

field.name: ElevationAGL
field.semantics: The ElevationAGL element specifies the altitude, in meters of a position for the flight level for aircraft; depth for submerged objects; height of equipment or structures on the ground.

fixedRecordData.name: UTMStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: The UTM element, specifies the Universal Transverse Mercator (UTM) coordinate and is made up of the child elements.

field.name: GridZone
field.semantics: The UTMGridZone element specifies the UTM Grid Zone designator to include the number and letter as defined by NIMA TM 8358.1.

field.name: Easting
field.semantics: The UTMEasting element specifies the easting component of the UTM coordinate.

field.name: Northing
field.semantics: The UTMNorthing element specifies the northing component of the UTM coordinate.

field.name: ElevationAGL
field.semantics: The UTMNorthing element specifies the northing component of the UTM coordinate.

fixedRecordData.name: GDCStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: The GDC element specifies the Geodetic Coordinate (GDC) and is made up of the child elements.

field.name: Latitude
field.semantics: The Latitude element specifies the decimal degrees of latitude.

field.name: Longitude
field.semantics: The Longitude element specifies the decimal degrees of longitude. The domain type is msdl:floatLatitudeLongitude3_3.

field.name: ElevationAGL
field.semantics: The ElevationAGL element specifies the altitude, in meters of a position for the flight level for aircraft; depth for submerged objects; height of equipment or structures on the ground.

variantRecordData.name: FormationDataStruct
variantRecordData.semantics: Struct for enumerated choice for the type of formation being Ground, Air, Surface or Subsurface.

variantRecordData.name: LocationStruct

alternative.name: GDC
alternative.semantics: Geodetic coordinates in decimal degrees of latitude and longitude.

variantRecordData.semantics: A variant record for specification of the Units location. One of four different formats for the location shall be used.
